message_1: What is the output of the SHA-256 algorithm when the message input is "Hello, world!"?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello, world!", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the hash:

`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`

Keep in mind that any change in the input message, even a single character or punctuation, will result in a completely different hash output.
